name: Pillars of Eternity Fangame - A Farewell
name_original: Pillars of Eternity Fangame - A Farewell
description:
WARNING: This game contain heavy spoilers for the end of Pillars of Eternity. 

"A Farewell" is a short scene set after the end of Pillars of Eternity. Your journey with your companions has come to an end and it's slowly time to say goodbye. 

This game was written with the pairing Pallegina/Watcher in mind, so don't be surprised by all the gushing for our favorite ladybird!

This is my first attempt at creating a visual novel, so feedback and critique is very welcome.

Thanks for playing!
